notes.text: We now ensure that the Create action works correctly when inline edit is enabled in a list report page
You can now enable the save and leave feature to allow users to save an object page and navigate back to the list report page
We now trigger the Resume Action when users navigate to an existing draft
You can now use the `subSectionCreated` parameter to trigger a callback function when a subsection is created for the first time
We now disable the Edit button if the OperationAvailable annotation is set to false in collaborative draft mode
We now support input assistance for CAP back ends
You can now use inclusive semantic date ranges, such as 'Last X Months to Date' and 'Next X Months to Date'
You can now enable lazy loading for the entire application
